title: Alimentacion Integral Avanzada
description: Name in English is Advanced Whole Foods. Health food store carries a large variety of items including raw and vegan products. Family-run business also sells a wide selection of prepared foods including vegan meat substitute plates made with tofu, soy, and gluten and in-house-made tofu mayonnaise. Commercial products include tofu cheese, meat substitutes, taco filling, chorizo, and coffee substitutes. The shelves are filled with cereals (including quinoa), flours, seeds, vegetable oils, dried herbs, teas, vitamins, lotions, and cosmetics.
streetAddress: Luis G Banuet  and Agustin Melgar, Col Chapultepec Norte
